mapper.select: SELECT ECLASS_PDS_BBS_SEQ, REF , STEP , DEPTH,USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT,READCOUNT,FILENAME,ORG_FILENAME, STATUS, WDATE,SDATE ,EDATE, SUB_SEQ FROM ECLASS_PDS_BBS ORDER BY ECLASS_PDS_BBS_SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ECLASS_PDS_BBS (ECLASS_PDS_BBS_SEQ, REF, STEP , DEPTH,USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT,READCOUNT,FILENAME,ORG_FILENAME, STATUS, WDATE,SDATE ,EDATE, SUB_SEQ) VALUES(ECLASS_PDS_BBS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 0, 0, 0, #{user_id}, #{title},#{content},0,#{filename}, #{org_filename},0,SYSDATE, #{sdate},#{edate},0)
